Module cz.cvut.fel.pjv.dd_simple_tool
Package cz.cvut.fel.pjv.dd_simple_tool.model

Class Item

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.pjv.dd_simple_tool.BaseObject
cz.cvut.fel.pjv.dd_simple_tool.model.Item
Direct Known Subclasses:
EnergyPotion, Equip, Food, HealthPotion
public class Item
extends BaseObject
Structure for creating item objects. Items are defined by unique name, image, tag and sell value. Each item can be sold.

      public void use​(Player player)

      Parameters:
